quoteLast: his Excellency rose, and taking the cards up with both hands, threw them out of the window.

quoteLast: , the thermometer on the mantel-shelf indicated 50° Fahr. At 3 P.M. a violent snow-storm came on, succeeded at nightfall by a nipping frost.” These facts sufficiently indicate

quoteFirst: On another occasion, when the temperature was a little higher, viz., 24°–26½° C., a leaf was observed 17 times between 8.50 A.M. and
quoteLast: ; it changed its course by as much as a rectangle six times in this interval of 3 h. 26 m., and described two irregular triangles and a half.
